data_files.teen_processed.csv: Main teen dataset with cluster labels
data_files.social_processed.csv: Main social media dataset with cluster labels
data_files.recommendations.json: Personalized recommendations for each user group

model_files.teen_kmeans_model.pkl: Trained K-Means model for teen classification
model_files.social_hierarchical_model.pkl: Trained Hierarchical model for social media users
model_files.social_scaler.pkl: StandardScaler for social media data preprocessing

usage_instructions.app_startup: App automatically loads all data files on startup
usage_instructions.model_loading: Models are loaded for real-time user classification
usage_instructions.testing: Tests verify data consistency and app functionality
usage_instructions.data_updates: Re-run this notebook cell to update all components
